WorkItem.ClosedComment: I can't reproduce this myself. Can you add some additional details? Which versions of Windows/Visual Studio/TypeScript are you using? Is this in a particularly large file? Are you on a solid state disk or a traditional hard drive?
WorkItem.Description:
When saving 2 times successively makes VS hang for few minutes, it seems when you save the first time TSC tries to compile the file which makes it locked to that process, so saving another time before that task complete causes an error

To reproduce the error:
- Open Typescript file.
- Press CTRL-S 2 times fast
WorkItem.Summary: Saving 2 times successively makes VS hang for few minutes
